title: Their Eyes Were Watching God - hated Nanny for

content.question: Jamie had hated her grandmother primarily for

choices.label: physically abusing her when Janie disobeyed
encouraging Janie's self-reliance without much affection
trying to be her friend when Janie wanted only to be alone

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
